content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences. However, there are many cloud-based file transfer services available that are user-friendly, efficient, and provide varying capacities of storage.

Some popular options include:
- Dropbox
- Google Drive
- Microsoft OneDrive
- WeTransfer
- SendSpace
- Box
- MediaFire

These services allow you to upload and send large files, collaborate with others, and access files from anywhere with an internet connection. It's a matter of preference, so you can try them out to see which one best suits your needs.
